parameters.label: Server Name
parameters.description: Sets the internal servername to use. Affects the name of the save files that are loaded/saved.

parameters.label: Admin Username
parameters.description: Uses a different username for the default admin user when creating a server. Doesn't remove previous default admin user if there is one.

parameters.label: Admin Password
parameters.description: Set the default admin user's password automatically, bypassing the prompt if the default admin user is not found.

parameters.label: Default Port (TCP)
parameters.description: Overrides the DefaultPort config option in the INI file.

parameters.label: UDP Port
parameters.description: Overrides the UDPPort config option in the INI file.

parameters.label: Bind IP Address
parameters.description: Forces the server to bind to a specific IP address.

parameters.label: Steam VAC
parameters.description: Enables or disables Valve Anti-Cheat on the server. Overrides the option in the server INI config.

parameters.label: Statistics Period
parameters.description: Enables multiplayer statistics monitoring. The period is measured in seconds. Statistics saved in cachedir/Statistic directory.

parameters.label: Disable Log Types
parameters.description: Disables certain filters in the console log. Takes comma-separated list of DebugType values (e.g., All, Network, Sound).

parameters.label: Debug Log Types
parameters.description: Enables certain filters in the console log. Takes comma-separated list of DebugType values (e.g., All, Network, Sound).

parameters.label: Minimum Memory (JVM)
parameters.description: The minimum amount of memory to allocate to the JVM. Game will not start if insufficient memory available.

relatedTo.message: Minimum memory cannot be greater than maximum memory

parameters.label: Maximum Memory (JVM)
parameters.description: The maximum amount of memory to allocate to the JVM. Setting above physical RAM will use virtual memory.

relatedTo.message: Maximum memory cannot be less than minimum memory

parameters.warning: Setting above physical RAM amount will use virtual memory and may cause performance issues

parameters.label: Console Log Size
parameters.description: Sets the maximum console.txt file size in kilobytes.

parameters.label: Steam Integration
parameters.description: Enables/disables the game's Steam API integration. Disabling prevents joining Steam servers or accessing Workshop content.

parameters.label: Cache Directory
parameters.description: Sets the game's cache directory. Same as -cachedir. Only works on Linux.

parameters.label: Soft Reset
parameters.description: Forces the game to perform a soft reset.
parameters.warning: Does not work as of Build 41.78.16. Issue reported, may be fixed in future versions

parameters.label: Debug Mode
parameters.description: Launches the game in debug mode. Makes the CoopMaster coop server use debug mode if enabled.
